flow_suites.name: flow_F1: Create Product
flow_suites.description: The system allows creating a new product with name, description, price, stock and status

flow_suites.name: flow_F4: Update Product
flow_suites.description: Change name, description, price, stock or status of an existing product

flow_suites.name: flow_F5: Deactivate Product
flow_suites.description: Mark a product as inactive (is_active = false). It's not deleted, just hidden from listings

flow_suites.name: flow_F6: Register Customer
flow_suites.description: Create new customer account with email and name. If email already exists, return 400 error

flow_suites.name: flow_F8: Create Cart
flow_suites.description: The system creates an OPEN cart for a customer. If an OPEN cart already exists, it reuses it instead of creating a new one

flow_suites.name: flow_F9: Add Item to Cart
flow_suites.description: Add a specific product with quantity to cart. Validates product is active, sufficient stock exists, and increases quantity if product already in cart

flow_suites.name: flow_F11: Update Item Quantity
flow_suites.description: Change the quantity of a product in the cart. If quantity <= 0, remove the item. If quantity > available stock, return 400 error

flow_suites.name: flow_F12: Empty Cart
flow_suites.description: Remove all items from the OPEN cart

flow_suites.name: flow_F13: Checkout (Create Order)
flow_suites.description: Customer finalizes purchase. System validates cart not empty, validates stock for all items, subtracts stock, creates order with PENDING_PAYMENT status, marks cart as CHECKED_OUT, calculates total amount

flow_suites.name: flow_F14: Pay Order (Simulated)
flow_suites.description: Mark an order as paid. Current status must be PENDING_PAYMENT. Changes to PAID and payment_status to SIMULATED_OK

flow_suites.name: flow_F15: Cancel Order
flow_suites.description: Cancel an order and return stock. Current status must be PENDING_PAYMENT. Changes to CANCELLED and adds back quantity to products
